evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS cloud services for hosting applications and managing data securely.
Bliss Hospice follows HIPAA regulations to protect patient data in compliance with health information standards.
The company has a focus on interoperability and adheres to FHIR for health data exchange.
Bliss Hospice provides information on securing patient data that meets relevant health tech compliance standards.
The careers page lists positions that require knowledge of health informatics, suggesting integration with health tech standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement in X12 transactions or use of API automation.
